title: yAru ariyaro
sahitya:
yAru ariyaro nammUru haridAsarigolidare nammUru


caraNam 1    aNDada tudiyali nammUru adu kaNDavarillavo nammUru 
daNDe kANadu nammUru naDu maNDesthaLave nammUru
    caraNam 2    bailige baile nammUru adu baile brahmane nammUru 
bhava bhaya hara nALvude nammUru adu bhava bhaya haravE nammUru
    caraNam 3    para svaraveE nammUru adE paradEshigaLiruvude nammUru 
pUrNAnadave nammUru purandara viTTalane nammUru
